text: @RandPaul @NYGovCuomo The blame for #TrumpVirus2020  & every death falls upon Trumps lack of action while calling COVID19 a hoax, denying the reality & his opportunistic desire to financially benefit from the pain & suffering of Americans. His incompetence & glutinous greed for profit, killed many!
